name: Subscriptions Confirmation Message

fields.name: subheader_text
fields.label: Subheader
fields.default: If this is not your email address, please ignore this page since the email associated with this page was most likely forwarded to you.

fields.name: unsubscribe_all_success
fields.label: Message on unsubscribe
fields.default: You have successfully unsubscribed from all email communications.

fields.name: subscription_update_success
fields.label: Message on subscription update
fields.default: You have successfully updated your email preferences.

source:
{% email_subscriptions_confirmation 
    "email_subscriptions_confirmation"
    label='Subscriptions Update Confirmation',
    header='{{ module.header }}',
    unsubscribe_all_success="{{ module.unsubscribe_all_success }}", 
    subscription_update_success="{{ module.subscription_update_success }}", 
    subheader_text="{{ module.subheader_text }}"
%}
label: Subscriptions Confirmation Message
